seprhou.logic

Class Rectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • seprhou.logic.Rectangle

  • public class Rectangle
extends Object
    An immutable, mathematical 2D vector class

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rectangle(float width, float height)
      Constructs a new rectangle with the given width and height
      Rectangle(Vector2D point1, Vector2D point2)
      Constructs a new rectangle with opposite corners point 1 and 2.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Vector2D center,
                 float radius)
        Returns true if this rectangle intersects (overlaps) with a circle
        Parameters:
        center - center of the circle
        radius - radius of the circle
        Returns:
        true if they intersect

      • equals

        public final boolean equals(Rectangle other)
        Returns true if this rectangle is exactly equal to another

        You probably DO NOT want to be calling this method.

        Due to floating point rounding errors, this method is slightly dangerous and can return values you might not expect.

        Parameters:
        other - other rectangle to compare
        Returns:
        true if the 2 points are equal in both rectangles
